Issue.creator: yacovm
Issue.summary: Add support for state based endorsement policy in discovery
Issue.description: https://github.com/hyperledger/fabric-protos/pull/59 added a way to pass into the chaincode call a hint for state based endorsement policy, so that discovery will take into account that some keys have state based endorsement policies in them which need to be satisfied in addition/instead of the namespace endorsement policy.
